K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:86b-3: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:87a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:87a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:87b-17: bdag gis gtso bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su glengs pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:87b-18: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa gang lags pa de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:88a-0: kun dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam @88a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:88a-5: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gcig pu zla med par zhi gnas kyis gnas pas gnas par byed pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba la bar chad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:88b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:88b-14: lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-1: de'i khyim ga la ba der zhugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-2: nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-3: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa yin pa'i chos kyi sgo 'dis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-4: des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g-yas pas sring mo de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-5: 'khod ma thag tu des de'i tshi tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so; ;sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-6: de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-7: 'dod la sred pa spangs byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-8: mi mchog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-10: de nas sring mo des tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-11: khri de las babs nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-12: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-13: 'dod gang sangs rgyas smad pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-14: slan chad don du gnyer mi bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-15: 'dod la sred pa spangs bgyis nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-16: mi mchog sangs rgyas 'grub gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-17: bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-18: nongs pa de ni khyod la 'chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-19: srog chags kun la sman slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-20: bdag ni byang chub 'dun pa bskyed //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89a-23: sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bstan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-2: yang dag par rab tu bzhag nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-4: de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-6: nga ni sring mo de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-7: bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-9: des byang chub 'thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang sems can mi dge pa'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-11: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gang bzung na log par ltung ba'i chos su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-15: byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:89b-16: snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-0: gal te byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par @90a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-1: bskyed pa'i slad du 'di lta bu'i nongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-2: nongs pa ji lta bu byung bas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por bsreg par 'gyur yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-4: byang chub sems dpas ni nongs pa 'byung ba de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-5: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro bar bgyi lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-6: sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btang ba la ni ma lags so snyam du sems lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-11: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa ni nyes pa'i chos dang yang ldan par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-12: nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-15: ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-16: sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-17: rgya che ba dpag tu med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-18: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90a-19: des lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du nags 'dab dag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas de lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de dag 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-0: de @90b grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa de mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-1: de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la gtugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-3: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-5: des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-8: des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-9: sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-10: kho bo ni tshangs par spyod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-11: des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-12: bram ze'i khye'u gal te khyod dang lhan cig tu 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-13: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-14: bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-15: deng brtul zhugs gzhig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-16: des bu mo de mthus spangs te bor nas gom pa bdun bor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-17: de gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje skyes par gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-18: 'di ltar bdag gi brtul zhugs bshig ste sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:90b-19: bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa de bzod par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-0: bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang 'chi ba'i dus byed @91a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-1: par mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chags snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-3: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de de nas phyir log ste lag pa g-yas pas bu mo de bzung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-4: de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-7: kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-8: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-10: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-11: de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-14: the tshom za bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-15: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-17: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-18: sh'akya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma ni de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-20: ngas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba bsnyil zhing spangs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91a-22: sems can gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal par 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang @91b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-2: gal te dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-3: mo'u 'gal gyi bu dag thabs la mkhas pa yin par gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-4: dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-7: ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-8: sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-9: de dgon pa'i phug cig la gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-10: de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-11: de'i tshe na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing char chen po bab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-12: de nas bud med gnyis shig grong bar gyi lam na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bskyab pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-13: dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-14: phug de nas phyir byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-15: drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-16: mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-17: ae ma'o dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-18: mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyam nas tha ba dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:91b-19: de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-1: bar snang gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-2: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-3: bdag cag gi bstan bcos dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pas ni steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung ngo snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-4: de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te nyes pa la nyes par bshags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-6: gal te dge slong dri med de'i tshe steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-7: drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-11: the tshom za bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-12: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-14: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar der gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-16: rnam grangs des khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-17: mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92a-18: dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-0: rnam grangs des kyang @92b khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-3: smad 'tshong ma sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par lobs pa ni de'i 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-4: skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs su btang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-5: ji srid du skyes bu des las 'dod pa don thams cad ma bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad sri bar mi byed pa de lta de ltar de gnas par byed do; ;de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu de la mi lta /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-6: mi sems par spong bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-7: de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-8: rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang thabs la mkhas pa des sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-9: rnam grangs des sems can de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing de dag la yo byad thams cad kyang mi sri bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-10: sems can rnams kyi dge ba la dga' bas bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong bar byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-11: yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:92b-12: gang gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas par gyur ba dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-0: 'di dag gis phyir yongs su nyams par byed mi nus par shes @93a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-1: nas ni de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la mi lta bar spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-2: 'gro zhing de de dang 'brel ba'i sems la gnas par mi byed do; ;rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-5: mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongs su nyams par med kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-6: myu gu 'byung ba'i skal ba ni med pa de bzhin du; rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gdungs na de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-12: log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-13: sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-17: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bung ba ni me tog thams cad las dri snom zhing ro myang bar byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-18: gang la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-19: gnas kyi sred pa skyed par mi byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-23: me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93a-25: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-0: 'dod pa'i @93b dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-1: de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-2: gnas kyi sred pa skyed par yang mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-4: gzhan yang smas par mi 'gyur bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-8: nya pa shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni srad bu gcig la gzan ma btags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-9: mchil pa byas nas mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-10: de srad bu legs par bsrungs pa gcig po des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na ma mtsho chen po nas mchil pa de 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-11: rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang stong pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-16: 'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug par byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:93b-17: de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa des; gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-0: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis gzung ste zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang de ni gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa @94a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-1: gcig gis chings ma de dag thams cad bcad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-2: gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-5: gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis dga' ba myong bar byed cing de dag dang 'dre bar gnas par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-6: de gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na shes rab rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bcad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-8: de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-12: 'phong gi slob dpon legs par bslabs pa zhig ral gri rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa gcig thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-13: mgron po mang po sgrol bar byed pa de na sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-14: 'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-15: brnyas pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-16: tshig 'di skad ces gzhu yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-18: dong pa yang med; 'khor yang med pa 'dis ni 'gron po 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-19: 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar bar byed mi nus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94a-20: 'gron po thams cad bsgral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-0: chom rkun pa'i sde pham @94b par bya bar lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-1: de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-2: de nas 'phong gi slob dpon de 'brog dgon par song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-3: chom rkun pa'i tshogs lhags par gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-5: go cha srab bgos nas mtshon cha de gzas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-6: chom rkun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-7: des chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang phral nas yang mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-11: thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-12: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du ma chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe de dag de la ma dag pa dang snying rje skyed par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-13: tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-14: sems can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-15: bdud kyi sde pham par byed pa lta ga la 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-16: de ni gnas med pas de ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:94b-17: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:95a-0: shes rab kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i @95a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:95a-1: tshe na; shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad bral zhing rab tu gtubs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:95a-2: shes rab dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:95a-3: 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:111b-6: gang dag 'di snyam du sras sgra gcan zin ni yab dang yum gyi mer mer po las skyes pa yin no snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:111b-8: sgra gcan zin 'dis ni sngon 'di skad du bdag srid pa tha ma pa'i bur gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na sgra gcan zin ni lha nas shi 'phos nas 'dir brdzus te skyes pa yin gyi /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-6: 'gyod pa la gnas shing phyin chad rtsol bar mi byed pa'i sems can de dag gi 'gyod pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir yang las de kun tu bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-7: de dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-9: byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-10: dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-11: de la rnam par grol ba'i skal ba yod par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-12: bdag cag mi shes pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-13: de dag sdig pa'i las kyi nyes pa de yang 'chags la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-14: gzhan dag kyang mngon par 'du mi byed par gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-16: gzhan yang mu stegs can dag gdul ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-17: byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa kun tu bstan gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119a-18: las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyus ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-0: 'bras 'bru gcig tsam za zhing zas @119b gzhan mi za bas rnam par dag par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag yod pas de dag tshar gcad pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-1: byang chub sems dpas 'phags pa'i lam lam brten par rgya shug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-3: 'bras 'bru gcig tsam gyi zas ngan pa za bas rnam par dag par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-4: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad ces byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-5: dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras pa'i rgyu ni de yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-7: las kyi bya ba de la dmigs nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-8: byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa bstan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-9: lha dang phyi rol pa'i drang srong ngan pa la mos pa sa ya phrag bzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-10: nyis 'bum yang kha zas ngan pa des btul nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-11: de dag gis ye shes mngon par rtogs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-12: de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-13: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas zas la yongs su longs spyad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-15: shugs dang; mthu yang dag par bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-16: byang chub kyi shing drung du song gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-18: lus nyam chung bzhin du ma song zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-19: byang chub sems dpas ni zas ma zos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-22: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:119b-23: zas ngan pa zos pa lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-0: 'on kyang skye bo phyi ma dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin @120a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-1: pa zas mi za bas byang chub yongs su btsal bar sems pa de dag bkres pa'i yongs su gdungs pas ye shes bsgrub par mi nus pa de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zas la yongs su longs spyad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-3: bde bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni chos rnams mngon par brjod par nus kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-4: sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni mi nus pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-5: ngas sems can de dag la bde bas ye shes rtogs par kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-7: byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang grong mi'i bu mo'i zas la yongs su longs spyad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-8: zas kyi bde ba nyid kyis byang chub 'thob bo zhes sems can rnams nga'i rjes su slob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-9: de na byang chub sems dpas grong mi'i bu mo'i legs skyes ma'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-10: skye bo phyi ma rnams la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-11: byang chub sems dpas de'i kha zas yongs su longs spyod nas byang chub thob par kun tu bstan par zad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-13: byang chub sems dpas ni bsam gtan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-15: mchog tu dga' ba gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag mang por kha zas med par gnas par nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120a-16: de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-0: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' @120b rtsva dag slong bar byed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-1: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang rtsva gding ba la mos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-2: gdan la gdu ba ma yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-3: chog shes pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-4: rtsva 'tshong bkra shis pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-5: des kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rtsva dag phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-6: de yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul bral zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes ngas lung bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-7: de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-8: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-9: bdud sdig can ma 'ongs par myur ba myur bar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi byed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-11: byang chub sems dpas skabs ma phye bar bdud sdig can byang chub kyi shing drung du 'ong ba ni gnas med cing skabs med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-12: de ni gnas med mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-14: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug pa na 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-15: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'dod pa'i khams 'di na dbang phyug ni su yin; sems can 'di dag ni su'i dbang du song snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-17: de ni bdud sdig can yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:120b-18: de'i dbang du song ngo snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-0: de na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems @121a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-1: te; bdag gis bdud sdig can dang g-yul sprad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-2: de las rgyal bar byas na 'dod pa'i khams kyang rgyal bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-3: bdud kyi 'khor mang po yang 'du bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-7: lha ma yin gyi 'khor kyang 'du bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-8: 'khor mang po 'dus pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge rnam par rtse ba mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing smon lam 'debs par yang 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-10: gzhan gang dag gis mthong ba de dag la yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro snyam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pas mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-13: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-14: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dag kyang yongs su gtugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-15: bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong nas 'od de las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-16: sh'akya'i sras po de sh'akya'i khab nas mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-17: de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-18: bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' zhing; sems can brgya stong dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' bar byed par 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121a-19: bdud kyi phyogs nyung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-1: khyod song la de dang g-yul sprod cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-3: de nas 'od des bdud sdig can la yang dag par bskul ba na de mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen pos gzir bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-4: khro zhing rngam bzhin du de'i mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-5: bshams shing bsdus nas byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-6: byang chub sems dpa' la bgegs bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-7: dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi khor yug tu bdud kyi dmag gis gang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpas shes rab chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-10: snying rje chen po la gnas nas shes rab rin po che las nges par 'byung ba'i phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bus sa gzhi chen po la brdabs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-11: byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi sde thams cad pham par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-12: bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad ma thag tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-19: grul bum bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-27: seng ge rnam par rtse ba yang mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-28: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:121b-29: de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-0: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub brnyes nas zhag bdun du skyil mo krung @122a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-1: mi 'jig par shing gi rgyal po la spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs she na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-2: de na gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rab tu zhi bar spyod pa dag kyang 'khod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-3: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa mthong nas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-5: mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-8: mchog tu dga' ba skyes pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-9: bdag cag gis dge sbyong goo ta ma'i sems ci la brten pa nges par brtag par bya'o snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-10: de dag gis zhag bdun du sems gcig tu bsdus te brtags kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ci la brten pa ma rtogs nas de dag dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-13: mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-14: lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di ltar rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pas byang chub kyi shing la rtog par gyur cig ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-16: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas zhag bdun du skyil mo krung mi 'jig par shing gi rgyal po la spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs pa'i rgyu ni de yin; rkyen ni de yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122a-17: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-0: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med pa nas rnam par thar pa'i sgos sems can @122b thams cad dbugs phyung zhing mgron du gnyer nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-1: tshangs pas gsol ba ma btab par chos ston par mi mdzad ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-3: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-4: lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phal cher tshangs pa la brten cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-5: tshangs pa gtso bor 'dzin pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-6: de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni tshangs pas sprul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-7: bdag cag ni tshangs pa las skyes te; tshangs pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi byed pa po gzhan yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-8: ston pa yang gzhan med do snyam du sems pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-10: bdag gis tshangs pa 'ong bar byas shing tshangs pa la bsdad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-11: tshangs pas phyag byas na tshangs pa la brten pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-12: tshangs pas gsol ba btab na de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-14: de dag nga'i chos kyang 'dzin du ma nges so snyam du dgongs pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-15: tshangs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mthus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-17: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'ongs par zad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-18: tshangs pa nyid la ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes yid la byed pa'i sems gcig tsam yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:122b-19: de ltar na tshangs pa la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshangs pa la nges par spang ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-3: gang gi tshe tshangs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa de'i tshe na tshangs pa drug khri brgyad stong gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-7: 'di ni rab mchog yin te; bdag cag kyang ye shes 'di lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-8: yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-9: ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-10: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-13: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams la las kyi rgyud bcu po 'di dag bstan pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par yang blta bar bya; ldem po'i ngag yin par yang blta bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-16: byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam du phra ba 'ga' dang ldan na yang byang chub kyi snying por byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123a-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i gnas med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-0: de ni gnas med @123b do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-3: mi dge ba'i chos spang pa thams cad spangs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i lhag ma ma spangs pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba tsam 'di mi mnga' na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-6: las kyi sgrib pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-7: de ni gnas med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-8: 'on kyang sems can gang dag las kyi rnam par smin pa chud gzon cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-9: las kyi rnam par smin pa la ma dad pa'i sems can de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyud ston par yang mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-11: chos kyi bdag po nga la yang las kyi rnam par smin par 'gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-12: khyed cag la lta ci'i phyir las rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyud ston par mdzad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-20: lag rtsis legs par bslabs pa'i slob dpon ni byis pa rnams bslabs pa'i don du byis pa rnams bod pa'i tshul gyis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-21: yi ge'i phyi mo dag klog tu 'jug par zad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-22: de ni de la mi shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:123b-24: 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis bdag la thos nas ci nas kyang yi ge dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-2: byang bar bya ba de'i ched du yi ge'i phyi mo dag klog tu 'jug pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la legs par bslabs pa de yang ji lta ji ltar sems can gzhan dag gi las yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gsung zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-5: de lta de ltar las nye bar ston par yang mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-8: sman pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi par bya ba la legs par bslabs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-9: nad med bzhin du sems can nad pa rnams kyi mdun du sman tsha ba dag gi ro myang bar byed cing bsngags brjod par yang byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-10: rab tu bsngags pa rjod par yang byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-11: nad pa rnams kyis de mthong nas sman tsha ba de dag 'thung bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-12: yongs su longs spyod par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-13: de dag nad de dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-16: chos thams cad la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba brnyes pa yang las dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-17: mi dge ba 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes las kun tu ston par mdzad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-18: ji ltar na sems can rnams las kyi sgrib pas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-21: yid kyi las yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124a-22: bsam bzhin du las kun tu ston par yang mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-3: khyim bdag gi bu btsas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig la pha dang ma dag gis ma ma zhig byin par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-4: ma ma de nad med par gyur bzhin du 'di lta ste; khye'u de'i 'o ma yongs su dag par bya'o snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-5: sman kha ba dang bska ba dag so sor brtags shing 'thung bar byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi yab kyang snyun mi mnga' ba brnyes bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-8: las kyi bya ba chud gson pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las kun du ston par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-9: las che ge mo zhig gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes thos nas sems can de dag yid byung ba thob par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-10: de dag yid byung na sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-11: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-14: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-15: tshong pa nor 'dod pa lnga brgya tsam zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-16: de'i tshe na mgron pa de dag nyid kyi nang na mi las nag po byed pa'i sdig pa'i las byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:124b-17: 'phong rtsal gyi rig pa legs par bslabs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-0: tshong pa'i cha lugs kyis gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig kyang @125a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-1: gru bo che de nyid kyi nang du zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-2: de nas de snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-3: bdag gis gang gi tshe tshong pa 'di dag don grub cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-4: bya ba byas pa de'i tshe na tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral la nor rdzas kyi rnam pa thams cad khyer te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-5: 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-7: de nas tshong dpon de dag don grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-8: pha rol tu 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-9: de nas mi g-yo can gyi rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-10: da ni bdag gis tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral la nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di dag khyer te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-11: 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba'i dus la bab bo snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-12: de'i tshe na ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang gru bo che de nyid kyi nang du zhugs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-13: de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de gnyid log ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-14: rmi lam rmi ba na rgya mtsho chen po de nyid na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des de'i rmi lam du bstan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-15: mgron pa de nyid kyi nang nas ming ni 'di zhes bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-18: kha dog dang dbyibs ni 'di 'dra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-21: gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-22: bdag gis tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125a-23: nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di dag thams cad khyer te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-0: 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems pas gal te mi @125b 'dis tshong pa 'di dag srog dang phral bar gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-1: de'i tshe sdig pa'i las dam po byas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-3: 'di ltar tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-4: byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag yin pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-5: gal te mi 'dis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bsad par gyur na; de las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa des byang chub sems dpa' re re'i phyir yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-6: byang chub sems dpa' gcig gis yun ring po ji srid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su bsreg par 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-7: de la ded dpon khyod kyis de lta bu las brten te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-8: ci nas kyang mi 'dis tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag gsad par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-9: 'di yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs la mkhas pa bsam par gyis shig ces bstan to; ;rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-10: de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de sod nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-11: mi 'dis tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag kyang gsad par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-12: 'di yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam nas de zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:125b-13: mi mthun pa'i rlung langs te sdod pa'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-1: yang mi smra bar sems pa la zhugs par gyur pa na de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-2: 'di la tshong pa 'di dag kyang gsad par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-3: mi 'di yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ni mi 'di nyid srog dbral bar bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan med do snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-4: gal te bdag gis don 'di tshong pa thams cad la bsgrags par gyur na ni 'di dag gis rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis mi 'di yang srog dang phral zhing bsad par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-5: 'di dag thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-6: de yang 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-7: 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'di srog dang phral na gzhi des bdag bskal pa 'bum du sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su bsregs par 'gyur yang bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de la spro bar bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-8: tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag srog dang bral bar gyur na yang mi rung mi 'di la sdig pa'i las de snyed cig rab tu 'phel bar gyur na yang mi rung bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-9: bdag rang gis mi 'di srog dang dbral bar bya'o snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-11: de ltar ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-12: tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po de dag kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126a-13: mi de yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro ba las kun du bsrung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-0: thabs @126b la mkhas pa des bsam bzhin du chom rkun pa'i mi de mdung thung gis btab ste srog dang phral nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-1: mgron pa thams cad kyang don grub cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-2: rang rang gi grong khyer du phyin par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-3: rigs kyi bu; de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-5: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-6: tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po gang dag gru bo che de nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-7: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-8: rigs kyi bu; ngas thabs la mkhas pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-9: snying rje chen po des bskal pa 'bum du 'khor ba bsnyil te bor bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-10: chom rkun pa de yang de nas shi 'phos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-11: mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-13: gang gi phyir thabs la mkhas pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-14: snying rje chen po des bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du 'khor ba bsnyil te bor bar gyur pa'i don de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi sgrib pa yin par blta snyam na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-16: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-17: 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:126b-18: bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-1: kyi bu; de bzhin gshegs pas sems can las kyi bya ba la gzud pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-2: seng ldeng gi tshal pa zhabs la zug par bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la seng ldeng tshal pas zug pa gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rdo rje mkhregs pa ltar mi shigs pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-7: 'on kyang mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na srid pa tha ma pa'i mi nyi shu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-8: mi nyi shu po de dag nyid kyi dgra bo mi nyi shu zhig kyang yod par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-9: de nas mi dgra bo nyi shu po de dag rang rang gi sgyu dag gis 'di lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-10: bdag cag gis mdza' bshes ltar bcos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-11: rang rang gi dgra bo rnams kyi khyim du zhugs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-12: de dag srog dang dbral bar bya'o snyam du bsams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-13: gcig la gcig tshig tu ni ma smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-15: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-16: srid pa tha ma pa'i mi nyi shu po gang yin pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-17: mi de dag gi dgra bo gsod pa po'i mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127a-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mi bzhi bcu po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-0: skye bo phal po @127b che gzhan dag kyang gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-1: gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-3: deng sa phyogs 'di nas seng ldeng gi tshal pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te; des de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs g-yas pa'i mthil du zug par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-4: de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mod las phyogs de nyid nas seng ldeng gi tshal pa rnon po mtho gang tsam gyi tshad gcig byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-6: bcom ldan 'das; bdag gis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du dor bar bgyi lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-7: ngas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-8: mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'di sa phyogs gzhan du 'dor bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-10: de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos stobs kyi shugs kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa de bzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-11: 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kha gyen du bltas te rab tu g-yos par gyur kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-12: seng ldeng gi tshal pa de ni tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang mi 'gul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:127b-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-0: seng ldeng gi tshal pa de yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i gnas su 'ongs @128a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-1: so; ;de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su ri rab kyi steng du gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-2: seng ldeng gi tshal pa de yang ri rab kyi steng du 'ongs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'thab bral dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-6: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su yang gshegs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-7: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-8: seng ldeng gi tshal pa de yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'ongs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-11: seng ldeng gi tshal pa de yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g-yas pas zhabs g-yas pa bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-15: seng ldeng gi tshal pa rtse mo ya gcig sa la zug la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-16: rtse mo ya gcig sa las gyen du lta ba de'i steng du zhabs bzhag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa'i steng du zhabs bzhag ma thag tu de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g-yos par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-18: de nas nga la gnas brtan kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon 'phrin las kyi sgrib pa ci zhig mdzad lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128a-21: de'i rnam par smin pa 'di lta bur gyur lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-0: ngas de @128b la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-2: sngon nga rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song ba na tshong pa g-yo can gcig mdud thung gis btab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-3: srog dang phral bar gyur pas 'di ni las de'i lhag ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-5: de nas mi nyi shu po de dag gsod par 'dod pa'i mi mdza' bshes ltar bcos pa mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po la yang las kyi rnam par smin par 'gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-7: bdag cag la lta ci'i phyir rnam par smin par mi 'gyur snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-8: de dag de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-10: bdag cag kyang srog chags 'gums pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-11: rjes su 'gums par 'tshal ba lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-12: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nongs pa de dag nongs par 'chags shing mchis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-13: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa de dag rjes su gzung du gsol zhes nyes pa la nyes par bshags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la las kyi bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-15: las zad par 'gyur ba las brtsams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-16: de lta de ltar chos bstan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-17: mi bzhi bcu po gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:128b-18: srog chags gzhan bzhi khris ni chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-0: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi @129a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-1: zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug par gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-3: de yang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-5: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa snyun dang bral ba sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed las bkru sman aud pa la ha sta gan dha bslangs te gsol bar mdzad ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-7: de'i tshe na so sor thar pa'i bslab pa bcas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-8: dge slong rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa tha ma pa lnga brgya zhig nags khrod cig na gnas pa de dag la 'di ltar sman bkus te bor bas 'tsho bar mi nus pa de lta bu'i nad byung bar gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-9: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pas sman gzhan bsten par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-13: ngas dge slong de dag sman gzhan tshol zhing bsten par rjes su gnang bar bya ba'i thabs ni ci yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-14: rnam grangs ni ci yod snyam du dgongs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-16: 'di ltar gal te de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong rnams la sman gzhan dag rjes su ma gnang na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-17: phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dge slong rnams 'phags pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129a-18: 'phags pa'i rigs bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-0: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed @129b las bkru sman aud pa la ha sta gan dha bslangs te gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-1: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-2: tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag sman dag gzhan tshol la 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-3: dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-5: kho bo cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i mthu med cing dbang med pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-6: shi bar gyur kyang kho bo cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las yang dag par 'da' bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-7: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po de nyid kyis kyang sman bkus te bor ba spangs nas sman gzhan btsal gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-10: khyed cag kyang sman gzhan tshol cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-11: de nas dge slong de dag 'gyod pa dang bral nas sman gzhan btsal te bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-12: de dag nad de las yongs su thar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-13: nad dang bral ba de dag gis zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-15: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sman gzhan btsal ba ma mdzad du zin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-16: dge slong de dag kyang sman gzhan tshol bar mi byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-17: de dag nad de las thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:129b-18: nyon mongs pa las grol zhing dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-0: skabs ma yin zhing de na gnas med @130a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-1: de; de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-2: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad dang ldan pa grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir; ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-4: de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-5: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye bo phyi ma rnams la thugs brtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-6: rjes su bsrung bar bya dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-7: dge slong bsod snyoms pa gang la la dag grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-10: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-11: de dag bdag nyid bsod nams chung bas bsod snyoms mi rnyed pa de'i tshe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-12: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de nyid kyang grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir ci ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa de bzhin du bsod snyoms ma rnyed par phyir byung bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-14: bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-15: de bas na bdag cag bsod snyoms ma rnyed pas yid chad pa bskyed par mi bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130a-16: don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir @130b ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas grong du zhugs pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-1: gzhan yang gang la la dag 'di skad ces gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms ma phul ba'i bram ze dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-2: khyim bdag de dag ni bdud sdig can gyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes smra na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-6: bdud sdig can gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bar chad bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-7: gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag byin gyis brlabs par zad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-8: rang gi blos ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-9: de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-10: sems can de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas grong du zhugs pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-12: zhal zas bcad pa de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun la yid mi bde ba med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-14: sngon ji lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-16: dma' ba yang med par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-17: de nas de'i mod la lha'i bu bdun khris dad pa thob par gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:130b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu btud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang de dag thams cad chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta de @131a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-3: khyim bdag de dag gis kyang dus gzhan gyi tshe na ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-4: chog shes pa dag thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-6: nyes pa la nyes par bshags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis gtam yang dag par bstan pa mdzad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-9: mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-10: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bram ze'i grong shing s'a la chen po can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ba'i rgyu ni de yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-12: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-13: ci'i phyir bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-14: dge sbyong khyod kyis kho mo sbrum par byas kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-15: kho mo la zas dang gos byin cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab par gyur ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131a-18: de bzhin gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phang bar yang spyod mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas de mkhyen bzhin du btang snyoms mdzad @131b cing thabs la mkhas pas las kyi bya ba kun tu bstan par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-2: phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong dag byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-3: de dag la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pas de dag 'gyod pa dang sems zhum par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-4: de dag mngon par mi dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-6: de dag skur pa btab pa'i tshe na 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa nyid kyis kyang skur pa brnyes par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-7: bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir mi rnyed ces de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-8: de dag de'i tshe na skur pa de zil gyis mnan nas tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-9: nyams pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-10: bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma ni re zhig sdig pa'i las kun du rgyas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-11: rang bzhin gyi ma dad pa mang ba yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-12: de ltar las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa des na phung po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-14: skye mched de dag nyid kyis bstan pa 'di la gdon mi za bar rma 'byin par byed pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-15: de sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-16: gal te rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab par gyur na yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:131b-17: de gnyid kyis sad pa'i tshe na dri mar yang 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-0: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas thabs 'ga' zhig gis de mi @132a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-1: dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa de las bzlog par spyod na ni bzlog par yang mdzad la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas bsrung bar spyod na bsrung bar yang mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'ga' yang yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-5: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-6: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-7: kun tu rgyu mdzes ma kun tu rgyu dag gis sreg [*srog?] dang phral te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 'obs kyi nang du bor ba btang snyoms su mdzad ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dang ldan pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-9: de bzhin gshegs pas de de ltar 'gyur bar mkhyen cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-10: de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs byin gyis rlob par yang spyod mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-11: kun tu rgyu mdzes ma nyid tshe'i tshad zad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-12: gdon mi za bar gzhan gyi gnod pas tshul ma yin pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-13: rnam grangs des na gzhan mu stegs can dag 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dkar po'i chos rnam par 'phel ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132a-15: ji lta ji ltar de la gzhag par bya ba de lta de ltar de la 'jog par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-0: zhes bdag nyid kyi rang gi nyes pas shin tu tshar gcod @132b par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-1: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun gyi bar du grong khyer du ma zhugs par lha bye ba phrag drug cu btul nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-2: zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'khor bzhi po dag lhags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ye shes mthong ba skyes par gyur pa de lta de ltar de dag la chos bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-5: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-6: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-7: zla ba gsum du skye bo rnams la bag phab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-8: bram ze nyon mongs med kyi rta chas kyi nas dag gsol ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar khyim bdag des de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas ri mo mi byed par yang mkhyen mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-11: des mkhyen bzhin du dang du blangs shing btang snyoms su mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-14: dbyar zla ba gsum du gang dag gi rta chas kyi nas dag gsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-15: sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa sha stag yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:132b-16: de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-0: las dman pa byas shing mngon @133a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-2: las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-3: rta lnga brgya po de dag gi nang na rta cang shes gcig yod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba smon lam gyis bsam bzhin du der skyes pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-4: rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyang sngon mir gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-5: byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-6: de de dag yongs su thar par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-7: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir der skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-8: rta cang shes de nyid kyi mthus rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-9: de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-11: de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' rtar gyur pa lnga brgya po de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa de dag gi don du dbyar zla ba gsum der gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-13: de na rta lnga brgya po dag gi rta chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed phyed ni dge slong lnga brgya po dag la 'bul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-14: rta cang shes kyi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-15: phyed ni rta cang shes de nyid za zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133a-16: rta cang shes des rta'i skad kyis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-0: rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad @133b sdig pa 'chags su bcug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-1: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag la phyag 'tshal du yang bcug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-2: rta cang shes des rta lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces khyed kyi chas kyi nas dag las phyed phyed de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-3: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gsol to zhes go bar yang byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-4: de ltar rta lnga brgya po de dag gis sdig pa bshags shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-5: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dad pa bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-6: zla ba gsum po de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu dus gzhan gyi tshe na rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad shi 'phos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-7: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-8: lhar gyur pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas 'phul zhing bkur stir byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-12: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-13: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-14: rta lnga brgya po de dag 'dul zhing 'tsho bar byed pa'i rta rdzi gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rang sangs rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes lung bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:133b-15: de bzhin gshegs pas rta cang shes de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa la mchod pa byas shing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134a-3: de lta mod kyi; mi'i kha zas gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bsod pa cung zad kyang med de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134a-12: gyo mo la sogs pa de dag gi ro de lta bu dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134a-14: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yang 'ga' yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134a-16: rigs kyi bu; 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhal zas mi bsod pa thams cad gsol ma thag tu yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134a-18: lha'i kha zas las yang dag par 'das pa'i ro dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134a-20: de'i phyir rnam grangs des na khyed kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas thams cad ni bsod pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134a-22: de'i tshe na dge slong kun dga' bo 'di snyam du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung @134b nas; da rta chas kyi nas dag gsol bar mdzad pa lta zhes yid mi bde bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems la rnam par gzigs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134b-3: 'di ci'i ro yin shes sam zhes nas kyi 'bru gcig byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134b-4: des de zos nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134b-5: nga la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyal po'i khyim du skyes shing rgyal po'i khyim du legs par rgyas pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134b-7: bdag gis ro'i mchog 'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma 'tshal /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:134b-20: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-3: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang dag gis /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-6: sdug pa'i mtshan ma spyod pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-7: gal te de'i tshe na de dag gis zas bsod pa dag zos par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-8: de dag gi 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu shas chen po dag skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-9: de dag gis zas ngan pa zos pa des 'dod chags kyi kun nas ldang ba de dag srab cing med par 'gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-11: de dag thams cad kyis zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-14: byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-15: de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pa des /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135a-19: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa gso sbyong la bzhugs pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-0: nga ni ro rgyab na bas khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag dag @135b shod cig ces bka' stsal ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-2: de'i tshe na lha'i bu nyan thos kyis 'dul ba gang dag sngon dge slong 'od srung gis sangs rgyas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-5: bag yod pa'i bya ba dag la yang dang yang du dad pa bskyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-6: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa brgyad stong 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-7: lha'i bu de dag gis sngon yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam dag thos la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-8: lha'i bu de dag la dge slong 'od srung ma gtogs par gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bstan par gyur kyang de dag gis chos bstan pa kun shes par mi 'gyur bas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-9: de'i phyir dge slong 'od srung gis byang chub kyi yan lag rab tu dbye ba rgya cher bshad pas lha'i bu brgyad stong po de dag gis ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-10: gzhan yang sems can gang la la dag nad kyis gnod par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-12: chos nyan du ma 'ongs shing chos mi nyan pa'i sems can chos ma thos pa de dag 'di snyam du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po de yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam dag gsan nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-14: snyun nad las yongs su thar bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-15: bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos mnyan par mi bya snyam du sems par yang 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-16: rigs kyi bu; de ltar na lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-17: sems can nad pa rnams chos la gus pa kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:135b-18: de bzhin gshegs pas tshig 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-1: nga ni ro rgyab na bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-2: khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag dag shod cig ces gsungs par zad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la snyun mnga' ba ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-7: de dag la 'byung ba'i lus rags pa yongs su grub pa med pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-8: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-9: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sh'akya rnams rab tu rnam par 'jig par gyur pa na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-14: de ni sems can gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pas nye du rnams kyi srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po mthar mdzad pa mi shes pa'i sems can de dag 'di snyam du /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-18: don du bzhed pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-19: bde bar bzhed par yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136a-20: grub pa dang bde bar bzhed pa yang ma yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-0: de @136b bzhin gshegs pas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la tshig 'di skad ces nga klad pa na zhing mi bde'o zhes gsungs so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-7: de na sems can chad par smra ba de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-8: sems can srog gcod pa de dag las kyi bya ba la gzud pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas srog gcod pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu snyung zhing mi bde'o zhes las kyi rgyud de kun tu bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pas gsung gi 'phrin las brjod pa de bstan pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-11: lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags khri btul bar gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-15: de bzhin gshegs pas ni bram ze bha ra dva dza spyo bar byed pa la phyir spyo ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-16: yang na de phyogs gzhan du 'phang ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:136b-17: yang na de de bzhin gshegs pa la tshig gcig tsam gyis spyo bar yang mi spobs pa de ltar byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par yang spyod mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:137a-0: 'on kyang 'khor der lha dang mi mang po 'dus par @137a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:137a-1: gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma zhum pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:137a-17: lhas byin la brten nas nga pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs shing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138a-13: rnam par smin pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
