K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-9: de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa 'di la ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-10: de dag la 'dis don du 'gyur ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-11: thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di'i snod du 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-12: gang dag gis bstan pa 'di la bslab par bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-16: mtshan mo mun pa mun gnag gi nang du 'bru mar gyi mar me phyung na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-17: khyim gyi snod thams cad snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-19: byang chub sems dpas kyang thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di thos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-20: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par mthong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-21: bdag gis kyang 'di la bslab par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-22: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug cing 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-23: de ni legs par yang dag par brtson pas sla'o snyam du sems pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:138b-24: de thabs la mkhas pa de dag la legs par bslabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-1: rnams smas par mi byed pa de lta bu'i ming du yang 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-2: rigs kyi bu khyod mos par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-3: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-5: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer bas ni gang nas thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba'i dpag tshad 'bum du yang 'gro bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-7: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di thos na snang ba thob par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-8: the tshom dang bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-9: nem nur dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-10: de nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-11: 'khor bzhi po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i snod du gyur pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-12: gang dag snod du ma gyur cing mi shes pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa de dag la ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rna lam du grag par yang ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-13: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags bdun khri nyis stong dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-16: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-0: kun dga' bo de'i phyir @139b khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-1: thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-2: thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-7: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge bsnyen dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-14: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-16: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-18: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-19: 'dus pa sum cu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-20: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-003:139b-22: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba zhang ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa //
